message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $1350000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I understand its value to you is $1200000, and I believe this proposal strikes a fair balance between our interests. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to discuss this offer in more detail.
